类 DatabaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatabaseConnector

  • public class DatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to test database configuration.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      java.lang.String uri
      URI to use when connecting to database.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DatabaseConnector()
      Creates a connector from a "database.properties" file located in the current working directory.
      DatabaseConnector(java.lang.String configPath)
      Creates a connector from the provided database properties file.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Attempts to connect to database using loaded configuration.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTables(java.sql.Connection db)
      Opens a database connection and returns a set of found tables.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Tests whether database configuration (including tunnel) is correct.
      boolean testConnection()
      Opens a database connection, executes a simple statement, and closes the database connection.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • uri

        public final java.lang.String uri
        URI to use when connecting to database. Should be in the format: jdbc:subprotocol://hostname/database

    • 构造器详细资料

      • DatabaseConnector

        public DatabaseConnector()
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Creates a connector from a "database.properties" file located in the current working directory.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to properly parse properties file
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if properties file not found

      • DatabaseConnector

        public DatabaseConnector(java.lang.String configPath)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Creates a connector from the provided database properties file.
        参数:
        configPath - path to the database properties file
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to properly parse properties file
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if properties file not found

    • 方法详细资料

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Attempts to connect to database using loaded configuration.
        返回:
        database connection
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException - if unable to establish database connection

      • getTables

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTables(java.sql.Connection db)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Opens a database connection and returns a set of found tables. Will return an empty set if there are no results.
        返回:
        set of tables
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • testConnection

        public boolean testConnection()
        Opens a database connection, executes a simple statement, and closes the database connection.
        返回:
        true if all operations successful

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Tests whether database configuration (including tunnel) is correct. If you see the message "Connection to database established" then your settings are correct
        参数:
        args - unused
